title: Cif Cleanboost Bathroom Spray 100% grime & limescale removal for cleaning ceramic, chrome, enamel, plastic and stainless-steel surfaces 700 ml
features: Cif Bathroom Spray removes 100% of grime and limescale on bathroom surfaces
This bathroom spray is suitable for cleaning ceramic, chrome, enamel, plastic, and stainless-steel surfaces
Our bathroom cleaner is gentle on surfaces
Made with water and dirt-repellent technology, Cif Cleanboost Bathroom Spray is tough on dirt and limescale
Powered with Cleanboost technology, our bathroom spray leaves your bathroom surfaces with a 100% streak-free shine
Cif Cleanboost Bathroom Spray leaves no harsh smells
description: Product Description Cif Cleanboost Bathroom Spray will keep your bathroom sparkling for longer, thanks to its water and dirt‑repellent technology. Powered by Cleanboost, it quickly lifts away 100% of soap scum and limescale from your tiles and bathroom surfaces without leaving streaks, simply leaving a clean, shiny home. It’s so versatile you can use it on your shower, tiles, grout, sink, or as a bath cleaner. Our bathroom spray leaves your bathroom surfaces with a 100% streak-free shine. You can use it on ceramic, chrome, enamel, plastic, and stainless-steel surfaces without worry, first time, every time. Our bathroom cleaner is gentle on all kinds of surfaces and is formulated to leave behind no harsh smells. For beautiful cleaning results, spray onto the surface, leave for a few seconds, and wipe with a cloth. For tough dirt, leave for a few minutes before wiping clean. For a sparkling home, also try Cif Cleanboost Kitchen Cleaner Spray to cut through tough grease and grime. At Cif, we believe in revealing and protecting beauty for everyone to enjoy, every day. That’s why Cif has developed a range of cleaning products that remove ugly dirt without damage. Providing you with beautiful results for over 50 years. Ingredients 5 - 15% Non Ionic Surfactants, <5% Perfume, Limonene, Geraniol, Benzisothiazolinone Directions For beautiful cleaning results every time, spray onto the surface, leave for a few seconds and wipe with a cloth. For tough dirt leave for a few minutes before wiping clean.;For beautiful cleaning results every time, spray onto the surface, leave for a few seconds and wipe with a cloth. For tough dirt leave for a few minutes before wiping clean. Safety Warning Instructions for Use: To achieve 100 per cent soapscum and limescale removal and a streak-free shine, spray onto the surface, leave for a few seconds and wipe with a cloth. For tough dirt leave for a few minutes before wiping. For even more shiny results wipe away with a dry cloth. Use biocides safely. Always read the label and product information before use Please read the label for use instructions and test on small inconspicuous area before use Warning Do not use on marble, natural stones, painted wood. For use on painted or new/unusual surfaces test on a small inconspicuous area first. Rinse well after use on plastics and aluminium. Keep away from children. Avoid breathing spray. Keep away from eyes. If product gets into eyes rinse thoroughly with water. Manufacturer Contact Information Unilever UK Ltd., Springfield Drive, Leatherhead, KT22 7GR. Unilever Ireland Ltd., Citywest, Dublin 24, Ireland. See more
